realtimeweb.stickyweb
Class StickyWebRequest

Object
  realtimeweb.stickyweb.StickyWebRequest

public class StickyWebRequest
extends Object

Class for building up a Web Request; uses the fluent pattern.

Author:
acbart

Method Summary
 StickyWebResponse execute()
          Gets the response for this request, from either the online service or the local cache.
 String getHashedRequest()
          Returns the internal hash of the url and its arguments that will be used to look up the data in the cache.
 StickyWebRequest setIndexes(ArrayList<String> indexes)
          Specifies what parameters should be used when hashing a request; that is, what indexes uniquely identify a call.
 StickyWebRequest setOnline(boolean online)
          Set whether results should be returned from the web or from the local cache.

StickyWebRequest

                        Map<String,String> arguments,
                        LocalCache cache,
                        Protocol protocol,
                        OAuthService service,
                        Token accessToken)
Creates a new StickyWebRequest with parameters.

Parameters:
url - The url of the resource.
arguments - Un-encoded data that will be sent along with the request.
cache - A reference to the local system's cache
protocol - The method that the resource will be accessed.
accessToken -
service -

setIndexes

public StickyWebRequest setIndexes(ArrayList<String> indexes)
Specifies what parameters should be used when hashing a request; that is, what indexes uniquely identify a call. If null, then all parameters will be used.

Parameters:
indexes -
Returns:
